website_summaries.verdict: The best on the market. When it's time to replace an older iced tea maker, this machine is what the ideal bump-up looks like. Great extra features and a strong brand name.
pros: We found this iced tea maker hit all the marks: a streamlined design for refrigerator storage, reliable brew strength settings, and a paperless filter system that is easy to keep clean by hand
cons: Capacity may be a concern for larger families

customer_reviews.title: Shiney and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I did like this product for the time we had it, except for 2 issues. There was a potent chemical smell when we first got it and most of it went away after a few weeks of use, but the smell was still slightly there. Second, the boil option was inefficient because it continued to boil for awhile even after it reached the boiling point, so it was wasting energy. Other than those 2 things, I liked the look and feel of it. The company apparently doesn't exist anymore.
customer_reviews.author: No guarantees

customer_reviews.title: Why the hell would you want to boil plastic with your tea?
customer_reviews.text: I thought I found the perfect tea kettle, but I was wrong. What you can't see in the photos, is black plastic under the stainless lid on the strainer. Also, there is plastic on lid. When the water boils, condensation forms and drips back into the water. I gave it 3 stars because everything else was great. Well the beeps were annoying like others have said, but it was beautiful and well made. So, my search continues for the perfect electric tea kettle.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovekittycats

customer_reviews.title: Pretty elegant, quite efective
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. It performs as it is stated. The price beats most of its peers. The design is just great. I must write that I have used the kettle just for three days. It could be a good idea to have the tea types printed along the temps, on the kettle platform. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Ludlow

customer_reviews.title: Everybody Gets The Temperature They Like
customer_reviews.text: We really like this kettle. One of us like our tea warm and the other likes it piping hot. It is no effort with this kettle to heat the water first to 165 F pour off one cup and then up to 195 for the second cup and everybody is happy. Plus the water never boils, which will drive off dissolved gases and leave the water and thus the tea tasting flat.
customer_reviews.author: RocketMan1969

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has plastic on the bottom of the cup and inside the tea diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Viksicom

customer_reviews.title: This product heats up real fast. But the problem ...
customer_reviews.text: This product heats up real fast. But the problem is that it does not maintain the desired temperature once it is reached. So you have to drink your tea right away or it gets cold.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Maghsoodi

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Makes different temperatures of water and does so very fast. I love that it is a sleek/modern design and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: I Highly recommend this one for your Wife (And
customer_reviews.text: My Wife absolutely Loves her new Tea Maker. She has become quite the connoisseur of Yerba Mate teas. For the Guys... I Highly recommend this one for your Wife (And, of course yourself)
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: No good for your health at high temperature
customer_reviews.text: I returned the product. The strainer's cap has plastic inside. No good for your health at high temperature.
customer_reviews.author: nhienanh

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.text: great product and great looks for dinning room, as well!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Leigh

customer_reviews.title: This has been a very nice addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This has been a very nice addition to the kitchen. We've been using it for several months now and it is still working well and holding up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it was a fluke, but mine started leaking at the base after a few months
customer_reviews.author: C Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to clean. Boils the water quickly. No weird taste.
customer_reviews.author: Kuczus

customer_reviews.title: Great piece!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday present for my bf for his office and he absolutely loves it. Great piece!
customer_reviews.author: darkeyezangel

customer_reviews.title: A great partner to ur kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful kettle. Holds a lot of water and it does whistle when the water is boiling. I highly recommend this product and would purchase this again when I need another water kettle.This kettle looks even better up close and personal. It is a lovely addition to my kitchen! The electric look with shiny metal, which was what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product makes tea an easy process with the ability to do all in one
customer_reviews.text: This product makes tea an easy process with the ability to do all in one, control the temperature for type of tea, and then also seeps in the kettle. I am totally obsessed with the logical one stop shopping aect. Easy to clean. Can't imagine not having one now and have recommended to others already.
customer_reviews.author: Allhellbrokelucee

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Was hand washing with a dish brush and the glass shattered. No idea how to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bates

customer_reviews.title: Makes great tea. I use it every morning and have ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes great tea. I use it every morning and have no problems with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: kam5381

customer_reviews.title: It's attractive, but the keep warm feature shuts off ...
customer_reviews.text: It's attractive and easy to use, but the keep warm feature is defective and shuts off after a few minutes and that is the main reason we spent so much money. We wanted something that would stay warm in between cups.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unit doesn't turn off on 212 setting for high altitude.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tea kettle! I've recommended it to multiple family members and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hager

customer_reviews.title: Loved making tea in this tea maker
customer_reviews.text: Loved making tea in this tea maker, but it started to leak at the base of the handle after one month!! This is my second try, the first one did the same. I gave it a second chance because it is so user friendly, but will try a different brand!!
customer_reviews.author: ccmum

customer_reviews.title: If you are a frequent tea drinker that doesn't want to pay $200 plus for a good kettle, this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials. Design is awesome. Manufacturing needs improvement. Used this kettle frequently but had some leakage issues after 6 months of use on the bottom seal. E2E is the seller we purchased this from and when we needed a replacement they worked with us very efficiently. Recommend E2E as vendor. Was impossible to contact SMAL from China for a warranty. They are showing as direct Amazon seller as of this post so it should be easier now. Recommend this product as we enjoy it every day but also recommend the 3 year warranty option offered by Amazon at checkout.
customer_reviews.author: Commentator

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could make ice tea (Mr Coffee Ice Tea Maker was absolute garbage) and I couldn't be happier. Come fall and winter I will be thrilled to have the hot tea and spring and summer it makes two quartz of tea quickly that I poor into a pitcher and cool with ice. It's easy enough to clean and operate. The glass pot is sturdy. The tea strainer can use bagged and loose tea.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda M

customer_reviews.title: My 85 year old mother really loves good tea. From The Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf ...
customer_reviews.text: My 85 year old mother really loves good tea. From The Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf to the great stuff from Pests Coffee & Tea. This tea maker brings water to the absolute correct temperature, which is critical for good tea to be brewed properly. Easy to operate and clean, this is a very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The entire bottom of my pitcher has rusted. I want to send it back for a replacement but I am told that after a month, it is no longer eligible for return or replacement. How can I return the pitcher portion? The programmable part of it works great. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Looks like Glass, Tastes like plastic bag
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use the plastic taste is just as strong as the first use. It's not something you want. Whoever built this sure made a strong kettle tho. So sad its ruined by cheap plastic parts. Why would they put plastic inside the kettle???
customer_reviews.author: R. Prana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It did take a long time and a lot of boiling, once with a little baking soda, to get the silicone/plastic smell out. But it is well worth the effort. It works perfectly as described. I LOVE every aspect of this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L

customer_reviews.title: Carafe is leaking
customer_reviews.text: After sporadic use, the carafe began to leak water at the bottom where the handle is attached.
customer_reviews.author: E. S.

customer_reviews.title: A good find of a lesser known product - very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Use mostly for pour over and french press coffee but the tea part works very well. Very pretty and well built with minimal use of plastic and that plastic doesn't contact the water (the lid).
customer_reviews.author: Jim H NW Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Best tea kettle we have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: We love this tea kettle! Its is solidly built with the best features we have ever seen on any tea kettle. Quick perfect temperature and control over when and how long you steep your tea. Easy to clean ...well its just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: David Messenger

customer_reviews.title: After a few months of happy usage, the glass broke
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of happy usage, the glass broke, simply by lifting the kettle full of water. I heard the crack, then water spiller everywhere. Thankfully it didn't happen during boiling.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Gallas

customer_reviews.title: The teapot looks really pretty. It boils in a minute
customer_reviews.text: The teapot looks really pretty. It boils in a minute. And you can choose different temperature to make different tea. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works very nice. Fahrenheit & Celcius both marking
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works very nice. Fahrenheit & Celcius both marking. I have been using tea bags. But now on I am going to buy loose tea leaves. Already ordered 3 lbs. Wish it had a timer.
customer_reviews.author: microcrowns

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as more expensive models
customer_reviews.text: This programmable tea kettle is every bit as good as more expensive models. It's easy to use and does not change the flavor of the tea. I do not use the keep warm setting for the tea because I like to drink my tea fresh. But I do like keeping hot water for when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike7763

product_meta.title: Temp Programmable Combined Tea Maker and Electric Kettle with Tea Filter Lid, 1.7-Liter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars68 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
